thread.title: Danny Dyer flicks the V-sign after escaping to South Africa on EastEnders ‘gardening leave to sort his life out’
thread.title_full: Danny Dyer flicks the V-sign after escaping to South Africa on EastEnders ‘gardening leave to sort his life out’

author: jbyrne
title: Danny Dyer flicks the V-sign after escaping to South Africa on EastEnders ‘gardening leave to sort his life out’
text:
Comments DANNY Dyer flicks a v-sign as he poses with schoolkids after flying out of Britain. 
The soap star was mobbed by the young fans on a school cricket tour when they landed at Cape Town international airport on February 11. Danny flicks a v-sign as he poses with schoolkids after flying out of Britain Sunday Mirror 9 The EastEnders star was spotted in Cape Town after fleeing the UK to ‘sort his life out’ 
The lads later posted the snap online of the star flicking up two fingers while wearing a camouflage jacket and dark sunglasses. 
Sources say Danny has swapped his Essex home for the African sun to “sort his life out”. It is thought he is planning to stay there, and out of the limelight, for around a month. Getty Images Danny Dyer has been inundated with messages of support from fans Related stories ‘A WELL DESERVED REST’ Danny Dyer’s fans inundate him with messages of support after he leaves the UK following forced EastEnders break FLYING SOLO Danny Dyer leaves the UK and flies to South Africa alone after being forced to take a break from EastEnders 'I’m God here' EastEnders bosses forced Danny Dyer to take break from the soap after months of violent mood-swings on set with cast complaining he 'walks around like he owns Albert Square' dyer alarm EastEnders' Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll Don't do one Dyer EastEnders cast fear Danny Dyer will quit soap after bosses force party animal actor to take a break WALFORD IN CHAOS EastEnders crisis as Danny Dyer's exit destroys storylines including Whitney Carter's 'pregnancy' 
An eyewitness said: “Danny was travelling by himself on an evening flight. He had a porter dealing with his luggage but other than that he was flying solo. 
“He kept his head down and was checking his phone. He was flying first class and sat in the lounge on his iPad drinking a couple of beers.” Rex Features Dyer’s pals fear drink and drugs may have taken their toll on the soap star Rex Features Danny Dyer and former Towie star Kirk Norcross snapped drinking together at film premiere in 2013 Twitter
